title: Narrative
instruction: Select the forward arrows to move through the narrative on a desktop, or swipe the images and select the plus icons to do so on mobile.

_items.title: Tell a story
_items.body: Narratives should be used to tell a story or to help learners with a process that needs to be in order.

_items.title: Optimised for touch events
_items.body: The narrative was built with touch devices in mind - so you can swipe through the images if you device is touch enabled.
